医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示患有前列腺癌的黑人和白人之间的血管健康差异乔治亚医学院的研究人员表示，与白人男性相比，最近诊断出前列腺癌的黑人男性的微血管功能较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Study-reveals-angio-health-disparities- Between-Black-and-white-men-with-prostate-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Study-reveals-angio-health-disparities- Between-Black-and-white-men-with-prostate-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68bcadaa-028d-4987-9970-b00292e863e7 Sun, 07 Apr 2024 04:50:41 -0400 Study reveals vascular health disparities between Black and white men with prostate cancer diagnosis
定期的晚年锻炼对 DNA 损伤和端粒功能障碍具有有益影响犹他大学内科的一项研究表明，晚年定期进行有氧运动可以预防以 DNA 损伤和端粒功能障碍为特征的基因组不稳定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Regular-late-life-exercise-has-a-beneficial-impact-on-DNA-damage-and-telomere-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Regular-late-life-exercise-has-a-beneficial-impact-on-DNA-damage-and-telomere-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=116d4ff2-a180-41f0-b6ef-447602bb198e Sun, 07 Apr 2024 04:20:00 -0400 Regular late-life exercise has a beneficial impact on DNA damage and telomere dysfunction
大量饮酒会增加中年人患 2 型糖尿病的风险根据本周在加州长滩举行的美国生理学峰会上公布的研究结果，大量饮酒可能会增加中年人患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Heavy-alcohol-use-linked-to-increased-risk-of-Type-2-diabetes-in-middle-ged-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Heavy-alcohol-use-linked-to-increased-risk-of-Type-2-diabetes-in-middle-ged-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a236ee4-c75f-4023-b37d-4d6fb1380986 Sun, 07 Apr 2024 04:11:30 -0400 Heavy alcohol use linked to increased risk of Type 2 diabetes in middle-aged adults
间歇性禁食可增强衰老小鼠的葡萄糖加工和肠道健康一项对小鼠进行的研究发现，间歇性禁食带来的好处不仅仅是减肥，这表明这种做法可以帮助身体更好地处理葡萄糖并减少与年龄相关的肠道功能下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Intermittent-fasting-enhances-glucose-processing-and-intestinal-health-in-aging-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Intermittent-fasting-enhances-glucose-processing-and-intestinal-health-in-aging-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fabe592-258d-47cf-93a2-48c890616f66 Sun, 07 Apr 2024 03:45:20 -0400 Intermittent fasting enhances glucose processing and intestinal health in aging mice
肥胖和高脂肪饮食与脑血管加速老化有关一项在老鼠身上进行的新研究追踪了肥胖和高脂肪饮食如何加速向大​​脑供血的血管的衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Obesity-and-high-fat-diets-linked-to-accelerated-aging-in-brain-blood-vessels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Obesity-and-high-fat-diets-linked-to-accelerated-aging-in-brain-blood-vessels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06863254-1397-4b64-b6fd-cce666736ed2 Sun, 07 Apr 2024 01:57:05 -0400 Obesity and high-fat diets linked to accelerated aging in brain blood vessels
中等剂量的对乙酰氨基酚可能会改变心脏功能根据对小鼠进行的一项新研究，发现普通止痛药对乙酰氨基酚在中等剂量定期使用时会改变心脏组织中的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Acetaminophen-at-moderate-doses-may-alter-heart-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240407/Acetaminophen-at-moderate-doses-may-alter-heart-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=006efeea-60ab-41c7-b065-8a145b1eb1a9 Sun, 07 Apr 2024 01:40:15 -0400 Acetaminophen at moderate doses may alter heart function
提塔利克鱼化石揭示了步行进化的关键一步在从鳍进化出腿之前，轴向骨骼-；包括头部、颈部、背部和肋骨的骨骼——；我们已经经历了一些变化，这些变化最终将帮助我们的祖先支撑他们的身体在陆地上行走。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Tiktaalik-fossil-reveals-key-step-in-evolution-of-walking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Tiktaalik-fossil-reveals-key-step-in-evolution-of-walking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dc0a071-d637-456c-9707-f0cc80b05487 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 23:52:00 -0400 Tiktaalik fossil reveals key step in evolution of walking
加州大学洛杉矶分校研究发现术前免疫治疗对胰腺癌患者是安全的由加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心研究人员领导的一项试点研究表明，对于患有临界可切除胰腺癌的患者来说，在手术前联合使用免疫治疗药物和化疗是安全的，并且可能会改善长期结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UCLA-study-finds-pre-surgery-immunotherapy-safe-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/UCLA-study-finds-pre-surgery-immunotherapy-safe-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6c25fe2-55ab-4f8f-8075-e8208ab98ca3 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 23:51:00 -0400 UCLA study finds pre-surgery immunotherapy safe for pancreatic cancer patients
研究人员开发出第一张与疾病相关的 DNA 重复序列的遗传图谱由加州大学欧文分校领导的一个研究小组针对多次重复的短长度 DNA 构建了第一个遗传参考图谱，这些短长度 DNA 已知会导致 50 多种致命的人类疾病，包括肌萎缩侧索硬化症、亨廷顿舞蹈症和多种癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Researchers-develop-first-genic-maps-for-disease-linked-DNA-repeats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Researchers-develop-first-genic-maps-for-disease-linked-DNA-repeats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=414bb6ff-7b3d-4ee3-912b-b77dc76bc8e5 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 23:48:48 -0400 Researchers develop first genetic maps for disease-linked DNA repeats
研究表明爆炸暴露会导致肠道通透性纽约和落基山美国退伍军人事务部研究人员的一项研究表明，爆炸暴露会导致肠道通透性，这种情况会导致肠道细菌进入血液并导致身体其他部位出现问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Blast-exposure-can-cause-intestinal-permeability-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240405/Blast-exposure-can-cause-intestinal-permeability-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4420b7fa-8324-4eb0-b978-0538b70376f6 Fri, 05 Apr 2024 23:42:47 -0400 Blast exposure can cause intestinal permeability, study shows
